content.rendered:
The eGrow Plants template is a minimalist eCommerce design ideal for a wide range of stores, not just for plants. It has a very calm vibe with neutral colors, lots of whitespace and some nice shaded images.

The design includes simple navigation, a cart option in the top bar, highlighted products section, attractive product pages and flexible content areas ideal for any store. It also integrates seamlessly with WooCommerce.

Key features of the eGrow Plants template

  • Minimalist eCommerce template with a relaxed feel
  • Lots of whitespace and neutral colors
  • Flexible content areas ideal for products
  • Cart icon in the top bar
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders

excerpt.rendered: Minimalist eCommerce template ideal for most types of online store
